text:
@realDonaldTrump BASEBALL ANALOGY...
STRIKE ONE!  You stood yesterday at your Covid Conference, & repeatedly stated, "THERE'S A GOOD CHANCE THAT THIS CORONAVIRUS WILL NEVER COME BACK IN THE FALL!"
Then YOUR LEADING MEDICAL EXPERT SAID, "THE CORONAVIRUS WILL DEFINTELY RETURN IN THE FALL!"
STRIKE 1
